

```{r}
source("analysis.R")
gci = filter(rbind(
  read.al(paste("./input-entries/", "gci", 1, ".csv", sep=""))
  ), status == 200)
nogci = filter(rbind(
  read.al(paste("./input-entries/", "nogci", 1, ".csv", sep=""))
  ), status == 200)
print_latency_summary_table(nogci, gci, "NOGCI", "GCI  ")
plot_ecdf(gci,nogci, 150)
```

```{r}
plot(gci$latency)
plot(nogci$latency)
```

```{r}
hist(gci$latency)
hist(nogci$latency)
```
